Guest Molecules.Molecular Size: 1.48 Å (neat Zn2+ ions), 8.6 Å (hydrated Zn(H2O)6 2+ ions)

Other Information.Additional Info: Hydrated Zn(H2O)6 2+ ions are blocked by the channels, while neat Zn2+ ions can pass through.

Experimental Validation.Method: Density functional theory (DFT) calculations, electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS), and galvanostatic charging/discharging (GCD) cycling
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Zn2+ ion transfer number: increased from 0.36 to 0.73; desolvation activation energy: decreased from 34.5 to 29.9 kJ mol−1

Other Information.Additional Info: The amino-functionalized channels within UiO-66-NH2 promote Zn2+ ion transport, guide uniform Zn2+ ion flux, accelerate Zn deposition kinetics, and inhibit H2O-related parasitic reactions.
